description:
This is a market on whether a team from North America will get out of groups and reach the playoffs at the League of Legends 2021 World Championship. The group stage runs from October 11, 2021, to October 18, 2021, and you can find more information on its process at this address: https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/World_Championship/2021/Group_Stage
The North American teams qualified for the event are currently 100 Thieves, Team Liquid and Cloud 9, although the latter has to get out of the play-in stage to join the group stage.
If one or more teams from North America qualifies for the playoffs, the market will resolve “Yes.” Otherwise, the market will resolve “No.” If the group stage is postponed to a date on or before October 30, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the group stage is postponed to a date after October 30, 2021, or canceled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Will a team from North America get out of groups at the 2021 LoL Worlds?

question: Will a team from North America get out of groups at the 2021 LoL Worlds?
